attributes.action: Ban Donald Trump from Twitter for inciting Racial Hatred
attributes.additional_details:
https://twitter.com/JaydaBF/status/935775552102981633
https://twitter.com/JaydaBF/status/935805606447013888
https://twitter.com/JaydaBF/status/935609305574903812

"@Theresa_May don’t focus on me, focus on the destructive Radical Islamic Terrorism that is taking place within the United Kingdom. We are doing just fine!"
attributes.background: On 29th November 2017, President Donald Trump retweeted three inflammatory videos from a British far-right account rife with anti-Muslim content. This is not the first time President Trump has used 'racist' views in tweets and it probably won't be the last!

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for banning people from using Twitter.
